title: Video: Natas Loves You – Skip Stones
body:
Cross-country five piece **Natas Loves You** formed in Luxembourg, but its members hail from in and around Paris. The new video for track _Skip Stones_ features footage of a trip to India and serves as a perfect backdrop to the slick production and infectiously catchy hook. Think **Passion Pit** mashed with **MGMT**, with a little **Metronomy** thrown in for good measure. In other words, perfect daytime festival music.

You can watch the video for _Skip_ _Stones_ above
